thread.title: Old English style. With french cuisine
thread.title_full: Old English style. With french cuisine - Review of Saint James Paris - Relais et Chateaux, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Chuck S
title: Old English style. With french cuisine
text:
Difficult to imagine this place in Paris, Decoration is unique, kind of an excentric English Lord. You feel at home. It a an hotel particulier at the end of the day.
Bar, salon, library,... the good old worldRestaurant is a beautiful room, discreet, an the kitchen is a must.
Perfect place for business meeting or romantic
